verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Gracious God, we worship Thee, Revâ€™rently we bow the knee; Jesus Christ, our only plea: Father, we adore Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Vast Thy love, how deep, how wide, In the gift of Him who died; Righteous claims all satisfied: Father, we adore Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Low we bow before Thy face, Sons of God, O wondrous place; Great the riches of Thy grace: Father, we adore Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: By Thy Spirit grant that we Worshipers in truth may be; Praise, as incense sweet to Thee: Father, we adore Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Yet again our song we raise, Note of deep adoring praise; Now, and soon through endless days: Father, we adore Thee.
